casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael Eugene REED, II. No. 232P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. Mark L. Killian, Newton, for Reed. Buren R. Shields, III, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st day of March 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st day of April 2004."
